4 LDA model

Source: vignettes/articles/4-LDA-model.Rmd
4-LDA-model.Rmd
library(rfintext)
library(quanteda)
#> Warning in .recacheSubclasses(def@className, def, env): undefined subclass
#> "ndiMatrix" of class "replValueSp"; definition not updated
#> Package version: 3.3.1
#> Unicode version: 14.0
#> ICU version: 70.1
#> Parallel computing: 4 of 4 threads used.
#> See https://quanteda.io for tutorials and examples.
library(topicmodels)
library(topicdoc)
library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'dplyr'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
dtm <- aspol |>
  preprocess_corpus() |>
  corpus_to_dtm(kunta, LEMMA)
#> Dropped 222659 rows
#> Dropped 2309 rows
#> Dropped 19 rows
#> Dropped 33047 rows
#> Dropped 9180 rows
#> Dropped 3076 rows

Optimal values for k are 6 and 15.

lda1 <- topicmodels::LDA(quanteda::convert(dtm, to = "tm"), k = 6, control = list(seed = 1234))
lda2 <- topicmodels::LDA(quanteda::convert(dtm, to = "tm"), k = 15, control = list(seed = 1234))
topic_diagnostics(lda1, dtm)
#>   topic_num topic_size mean_token_length dist_from_corpus tf_df_dist
#> 1         1   532.4391               6.5        0.3193975   75.42363
#> 2         2   596.7121               7.2        0.3038044   81.43016
